com.constantcontact.exceptions.service

Class ConstantContactServiceException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • com.constantcontact.exceptions.ConstantContactException
          • com.constantcontact.exceptions.service.ConstantContactServiceException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ConstantContactServiceException
extends ConstantContactException
    Constant Contact Service Exception : the Service-layer class for exceptions in ConstantContact.
    Extends the base class, ConstantContactException
    This is the exception being thrown from ALL the Service Layer methods.
    Author:
    ConstantContact
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
